Given the user navigates to login page # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.navigates_to_login_page() When user enters username as "student" and password as "Password123" # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.user_enters_username_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user clicks on the submit button # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.user_clicks_on_the_submit_button() Then the user should be redirected to MyAccount page # stepDefinitions.LoginSteps.validate_my_account_page() java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.quit()" because "this.driver" is null at stepDefinitions.Hooks.tearDown(Hooks.java:33)
